summary: BuildRequest REQ-59 asked only to replace the existing static UPI QR image file at a fixed path, with no code/config changes. The diff summary shows no modification of the QR asset file and instead updates project metadata/summaries describing many unrelated frontend changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the static UPI QR asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/upi-qr.dim_800x800.jpg` with the newly uploaded QR image while keeping the code/path unchanged (`/assets/generated/upi-qr.dim_800x800.jpg`).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not show any change to `frontend/public/assets/generated/upi-qr.dim_800x800.jpg` (only two non-asset files were modified). There is also no evidence in the provided diff summary that the QR image replacement occurred or that the build will include the updated asset.
evidence: <file-diff>: Modified files list only includes `frontend-file-summaries.txt` and `project_state.json`; no mention of `frontend/public/assets/generated/upi-qr.dim_800x800.jpg`.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrelated frontend route/layout/admin-portal changes (TanStack Router route trees, AdminLayout/Admin routes, AdminGuard, access denied screen, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-59, which explicitly scoped the change to replacing a static QR image asset and avoiding donation flow/backend/config changes.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (truncated): entries for `frontend/src/App.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGuard.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessDeniedScreen.tsx`, and multiple admin-related pages/routes.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrelated changes to donation page content and other public pages (dashboard, ledger, donors, donor detail, transaction detail) and React Query hooks behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-59; these are functional/UI changes beyond replacing an image asset.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state update unrelated to QR asset replacement (project_state.json version/summary/features list).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-59 did not request any project state/schema/feature registry changes.
